sentences.en: Apart from this, being able to give up labor-intensive grain production freed both the land and the workforce for more productive agricultural divisions.
sentences.cn: 除此之外，放弃劳动密集型的粮食生产，解放了土地和劳动力，形成了更高效的农业部门。

sentences.en: Production of corn, cotton, rice, soybeans, and wheat has been largely mechanized, but many high-value, labor-intensive crops, such as strawberries, need labor.
sentences.cn: 玉米、棉花、水稻、大豆和小麦的生产已在很大程度上实现了机械化，但许多高价值、劳动密集型的作物，如草莓，都需要劳动力。

sentences.en: Grass-fed beef production ends to be more labor-intensive as well.
sentences.cn: 草饲牛肉的生产也变得更加依赖劳动力。
